pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 2, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, May 2, 2016:

Toronto

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Royal Highness, Prince Harry of Wales.

Fairmont Royal York
100 Front Street West
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Invictus Games Toronto 2017 Media Launch event and will deliver a speech.

Concert Hall
Fairmont Royal York
100 Front Street West
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should report to the Manitoba Room for 9:30 a.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Invictus Games Toronto 2017 Ice Sledge event.

Ryersonâ€™s MattamyAthletic Centre
50 Carlton Street
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
